name: Sinasi Yurtsever
summary:
Sinasi Yurtsever. Actor: The Magician. He is best known for role "Buyuk Hilmi" in hit comedy series "Kardes Payi" and as Hakki "Isler Gucler" in hit comedy series. He graduated from theatre department of Dokuz Eylul University.

He worked with Selcuk Aydemir director of Kardes Payi and Isler Gucler for many times. He played in many franchise films. He was cast in hit series such as Yabanci Damat, Bir Bulut Olsam,...
